alert.note: Alert for Appanoose; Davis; Mahaska; Monroe; Poweshiek; Wapello (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued December 15 at 7:51PM CST until December 15 at 8:15PM CST by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM CST FOR EASTERN MONROE...EASTERN POWESHIEK...DAVIS...WAPELLO...EASTERN MAHASKA AND EASTERN APPANOOSE COUNTIES... At 751 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Amana to near Downing, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Ottumwa, Oskaloosa, Bloomfield, Montezuma, Brooklyn, Eddyville, Ottumwa Industrial Airport, Eldon, Victor, Fremont, Agency, Moulton, University Park, Holiday Lake, Blakesburg, Deep River, Pulaski, Drakesville, Barnes City and Rose Hill. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CST for south central, central and southeastern Iowa. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Appanoose; Davis; Mahaska; Monroe; Poweshiek; Wapello
